alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Gabriel Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 06 at 9:38AM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Areas of northwest winds 25 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 80 mph are possible. * WHERE...Eastern San Gabriel Mountains. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A dusting to inch of snow is possible in the foothills near Valyermo to Big Pines/Wrightwood area, which could lead to reduced visibility and icy roads.
info.instruction: People should avoid being in forested areas and around large trees. If possible, remain inside and avoid windows. Use extra caution if you must drive.
